# Albert Casanovas

> Engineering Manager based in Barcelona, Catalonia. Currently leading the Reviews organization at Gartner Digital Markets.

## About

Albert Casanovas is a product-oriented Engineering Manager with 10+ years of experience building and scaling high-impact digital platforms. He leads the Reviews organization at Gartner Digital Markets — the engine behind millions of user reviews across Capterra, GetApp, and Software Advice.

His work sits at the intersection of technical architecture, product strategy, and people leadership. He cares deeply about developer experience, engineering culture, and the balance between strong architecture and pragmatic delivery.

Colleagues describe him as a connector — someone who unites teams after change, keeps communication open, and helps people grow through coaching and direct feedback. He has built teams from scratch, unified siloed functions, and consistently earned Exceeds Expectations performance reviews.
